summary: Congress started the Small Community Air Service Development Program to help small airports attract and retain commercial service. It has awarded $188 million in grants since 2000. We reviewed the program's awards process and the effectiveness of the grants. We found The Department of Transportation did not follow the selection process it described to applicants. It plans to update this information. Half of the 66...
title: Small Community Air Service Development: Process for Awarding Grants Could Be Improved
